extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.title: Too fast
reviews.comment: It is alright, but a speed control would be nice. It moves too quickly.
reviews.author: Keith Terrill

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The exercises are pretty good but the lessons advance too quickly and it\'s easy to get stuck.
reviews.author: Danny Tamez

reviews.title: Good, needs polishing
reviews.comment: All good, but is lacking the ability to jump between the pages of a lesson. Pls add this feature, it would be very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: This app has potential, although it could become a bit repetitive. It uses the same multiple choice approach to complex grammar as is uses for simple vocabulary. Also, accents/stress marks are omitted. Another slightly annoying feature is that \302\240\317\203 is used at the end of words rather than \317\202. Otherwise, a very enjoyable app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I tried the Italian app, and it was wonderful. Then when I found out that this was also in Greek, wow! You should try this. I\'m a kid, and I think this learn like kids program also helps us kids (as in under 12 year olds) learn languages faster.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: So this is a nice idea it would be even better of there was an English word with the Greek. Because just looking at the picture doesn\'t really help much. I don\'t know whether you\'re talking about the cup or the woman.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You may speak right but don\'t count on spelling
reviews.comment: While it annunciate may the words...it does not spell them correctly. All the words are missing tones over the vowels.
reviews.author: Pete Kakoudakis
